Tucson cocks his head to listen to Mach Kick closely.  It was intel he need=
ed to know.  

" All right, that means there has to be a main control panel=
 somewhere in the area that controls the energy fields on the bars, and a s=
ub unit that supplies the power to each individual cell.  Hmm, I don't know=
 that for sure about these cells but, it could be the way this area is set =
up. "

He gets back into beast mode and raises his body, standing on his hi=
nd legs.  With the use of his long neck, he tries to get a better look arou=
nd.

" Unfortunately, this is as high as I can reach, and I can't see anyth=
ing that resembles energy pipelines. "

He gets back on all fours.

" I'll =
need someone to stand on my head to see if any of you might be able to spot=
 anything.   Mach Kick, Break, with the two of you on my head we can defini=
tely get a better look at what the ceiling is like and see if any pipes run=
 across the cells.  It's all right, I'm strong enough to support you both."=


He lowers his head down to them and waits for them to get on.



Perpetua=
lly on the move and constantly busy. 

On Oct 3, 2011, at 12:27 PM, Super C=
yclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> > <OLD>
> >
> > Tucson gives a =
reassuring nod to Big Convoy and looks to the guards with a
> > comfortable=
 look on his face. He found this ploy to be working so far and
> > continue=
s to go with it.
> >
> > " it's all right, I'm being instructed by my train=
er as to how to proceed.
> > It's my first time in the arena and he's infor=
ming me of proper protocol.
> > No need to be suspicious, I'm not carrying =
or using any weapons at this
> > time, if that's what you're afraid of."
> =
>
> > He turns his head back to Big Convoy and the others.
> >
> > " this i=
s where it starts... Just keep an eye on my demeanor. I trust you
> > know =
how a dragon gets when stricken by Natural instincts. That will be
> > your=
 clue. But do not do anything until everyone's attention is on me.
> > When=
 it is and an escape route is established, that's when you make a break
> >=
 for the Ark. I may not make it out but I'm sure you will. Inform Lord
> > =
Elder and Leo Prime of everything that's happening here. I'm sure they will=

> > send help promptly. Good luck to all of you."
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> The SHAR=
KTICON styled guards, while seemingly a little more advanced
> did not appe=
ar to be much smarter than their predacessors. "We, afraid
> of you?" They =
chuckled.
> 
> The three of them indeed did not appear to be much afraid of=
 TUSCON or
> the others in the room, but then again there was still a barre=
d wall
> seperating them, and that wall had the low pitched wine of energy
=
> running through it.
> 
> "You just be ready for the games when they begin=
!" One of the guards said.
> 
> Another guard grunted. "Yeah! Then we will =
see just how loud you talk then!"
> 
> They turned as if to move on.
> 
> M=
eanwile MACH KICK looked at TUSCON quizzically, "One are you trying
> to do=
?" His whisper was low and quiet. "We have *tried* to get passed
> those ba=
rs, the're energized."
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Preston
>

l somewhere in the area that controls the energy fields on the bars, and a =
sub unit that supplies the power to each individual cell.  Hmm, I don'=
t know that for sure about these cells but, it could be the way this area i=
s set up. "</div><div><br></div><div>He gets back into beast mode and raise=
s his body, standing on his hind legs.  With the use of his long neck,=
 he tries to get a better look around.</div><div><br></div><div>" Unfortuna=
tely, this is as high as I can reach, and I can't see anything that resembl=
es energy pipelines. "</div><div><br></div><div>He gets back on all fours.<=
/div><div><br></div><div>" I'll need someone to stand on my head to see if =
any of you might be able to spot anything.   Mach Kick, Break, with th=
e two of you on my head we can definitely get a better look at what the cei=
ling is like and see if any pipes run across the cells.  It's all righ=
t, I'm strong enough to support you both."</div><div><br></div><div>He lowe=
rs his head down to them and waits for them to get on.</div><div><br></div>=

      <p>> <OLD><br>
><br=
>
> Tucson gives a reassuring nod to Big Convoy and looks to the guards =
with a<br>
> comfortable look on his face.  He found this ploy to be wor=
king so far and<br>
> continues to go with it.<br>
><br>
> " it's =
all right, I'm being instructed by my trainer as to how to proceed.<br>
&gt=
; It's my first time in the arena and he's informing me of proper protocol.=
<br>
> No need to be suspicious, I'm not carrying or using any weapons a=
t this<br>
> time, if that's what you're afraid of."<br>
><br>
> H=
e turns his head back to Big Convoy and the others.<br>
><br>
> " thi=
s is where it starts...  Just keep an eye on my demeanor.  I trust you<br>
=
> know how a dragon gets when stricken by Natural instincts.  That will =
be<br>
> your clue.  But do not do anything until everyone's attention i=
s on me.<br>
> When it is and an escape route is established, that's whe=
n you make a break<br>
> for the Ark.  I may not make it out but I'm sur=
e you will.  Inform Lord<br>
> Elder and Leo Prime of everything that's =
happening here.  I'm sure they will<br>
> send help promptly.  Good luck=
 to all of you."<br>
<br>
<NEW><br>
<br>
The SHARKTICON styled guards=
, while seemingly a little more advanced<br>
did not appear to be much smar=
ter than their predacessors. "We, afraid<br>
of you?" They chuckled.<br>
<b=
r>
The three of them indeed did not appear to be much afraid of TUSCON or<b=
r>
the others in the room, but then again there was still a barred wall<br>=

seperating them, and that wall had the low pitched wine of energy<br>
runn=
ing through it.<br>
<br>
"You just be ready for the games when they begin!"=
 One of the guards said.<br>
<br>
Another guard grunted. "Yeah! Then we wil=
l see just how loud you talk then!"<br>
<br>
They turned as if to move on.<=
br>
<br>
Meanwile MACH KICK looked at TUSCON quizzically, "One are you tryi=
ng<br>
to do?" His whisper was low and quiet. "We have *tried* to get passe=
d<br>
those bars, the're energized."<br>
